main event: An observer reported seeing a bright, star-like light in the sky that moved upwards and faded away over Coolville, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted over an hour,The object was described as star-like and not easily recognizable as an aircraft,The observer noted that the light emitted a pulsating brightness,The observer mentioned it was hovering at a low altitude with a metallic appearance,No photographs were included with the report despite earlier mention of them.
witness description: The observer detailed the object as a bright light, unable to identify it as a known aircraft.
